attributes.action: Call a General Election so the Electorate can decide on their MPs in light of the expenses scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With so many MPs from all sides of the house being embroiled in the expenses scandal it is time for the public to decide who represents them in their constituency. It is the only way to clean up the House of Commons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
